examples: She was surprised to find Chinese cabbage at the grocery store.

f you keep crying wolf, people won't take you seriously when you really need them.

examples: That bacon sandwich really hit the spot!

You can spot undercover cops a mile off.
Journalists on the spot reported no progress.
words.defineEn: to notice, detect, or see someone or something that is hard to do so
words.defineVi: để ý, phát hiện, hoặc nhìn thấy một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó là khó khăn để làm như vậy
